## absPath variable

Takes the path for the current key and a lookup path string. Converts the possibly relative lookup path into its absolute form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
absPath: (curr: LookupPath, path: string, idx?: number) => (string | number | symbol)[]
```
